name: CityBike
0:
”Alexa, ask city bike how many bikes there are”
”Alexa, ask city bike to manage my station”
”Alexa, ask city bike for help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: city bike
des:
Find out how many available bikes there are at your saved Citibike station within NYC (New York City)

*SAVE OR CHANGE YOUR STATION*

To save your station at initial setup or to change your saved station:
"Alexa, ask city bike to manage my station"
"Alexa, tell city bike my station is six eight three nine one zero"

Prerequisite: Get your station number from http://citibikenyc.com/map/ on a desktop browser.
Don't use periods or dots when saving
e.g. Grand Army Plaza & Central Park S station number is 683910 not 6839.10

*EVERYDAY USE*

To find out how many available bikes there are at your saved station simply say each day:
"Alexa, ask city bike how many bikes are there"
TIP: See visual card on the Alexa app for confirmation of number and quick glance for low numbers of bikes.

"HELP*
"Alexa, ask city bike for help "
TIP: See visual card on the Alexa app when asking for help for written reminder

**Doesn't include New Jersey
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
